alert.note: Alert for Corson; Dewey (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 12:59PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Corson and northwestern Dewey Counties through 145 PM MDT... At 1259 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Little Eagle to near Isabel. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Isabel around 105 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Trail City. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
